relation: There is a student union that has a pool table, Foosball table, and other games. It is also where most of the clubs meet.
Taco bell, White Castle, Red Mango, and more
Follow all the due dates when registering.
Very diverse in culture. People come from from all over NY state. Teachers care about the students.
pageTitle: Nassau Community College Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {127445=On Tuesdays and Thursdays, there is club hour from 11:30-12:30, and no classes are held from 11:15 till 1; so pretty much you can join a club and get to know some people. There's a ton of clubs to choose from, so it's easy to find one that will interest you., 135939=Many clubs are offered and meet during club hour which is 11:30 to 12:15, there are NO classes during club hour so you don't have to struggle to find a club that meets during hours that you can attend. There are many sports teams that are welcoming and all the coaches are extremely friendly. If you want to try out for a team, reach out to a coach and they will not turn you down, they will always help you out., 183805=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC}

textAfterTable: Am learning a lot Most Professors have a masters degree and most importantly experience in their field. For example, I took a personal finance course over the summer and my professor was a financial advisor or planner. Either way, she had first hand knowledge of the topics she was talking about. Login to rate or flag the reviews Cherish from elmont , NY 06/22/2009 Reviewer is A current student here. 4 out of 6 people found this review useful. 2 of 45 Categories Comments Great for these types of students this is great for a student that does not want to go too far from home but still get some freedom at the same you can relax and take your time with your classes Tips for prospective students just know that going to class is very important and try not to get a bad professor ask around or do your homework on every class and the professor before had...
